1.content:
When the airplane crashed, Alice, Leslie and Kelly had themseves well protected, so they survived the accident. Others may also survived, but no one knows where they are since all the people were separated by the crash except for those three girls. In order to protect themselves, they had they bag that is full of clothes with them. Therefore, when then left the plane, the three girls had some clothes with them. They stayed on some kind of wood and began to flow. Several hours later, the girls found something weird---their body are getting tickled somehow when the water get on their body. Pretty soon, the girls are laying on the piece of woon and laughing like crazy. "Hahahahaha....hahahaha....hahahaha...my feet..hahahaha...hahaha..." Then, they began to itch their body. But they were too ticklish to have enough power to take off their shoes. Luckily, another hour later, they arrived on the island. They began to change clothes and shoes. Since it is at noon, pretty soon, their clothes dried out.
What are they going to do then?
1.title: Island of tickling

11.content:
Leslie and the other girls decide to build a shelter to have some place to sleep. As Alice works on gathering supplies, Kelly looks for an ideal spot to camp out for the night. All three girls decide it best to stay by the beach, in case help were to arrive.
After about two hours of working on the shelter, Alice began to tire.
“Kelly, Leslie, why don't we take a break,” suggested Alice. Kelly agreed, and after some time, Leslie agreed that it would be best to take some time to rest.
“I know!” Kelly exclaimed,“let's bury you in the sand, Leslie!” Thinking it would be a good idea, Leslie agrees to be buried,and at the mercy of her friends, allows herself to be buried up to her neck-feet exposed.
11.title: Build a shelter

112.content:
"Now we can have some fun,"Alice smiles as she removes Leslie's shoes. Kelly reaches into her travel bag and pulls out some red nail polish and a tube of sunscreen. The two girls then eagerly remove Leslie's socks, casting them aside in the sand.
"What are you guys doing?" Leslie asks as Kelly paints her toenails a bright red color.
Alice,while waiting for Leslie's nails to dry, squirts a generous dollop of sunscreen into the palm of her hand. Kelly does the same and the two begin to rub the cold lotion all over Leslie's feet.
"Eep!" Leslie cries out as the girls mercilessly rub the lotion in. Leslie giggles as Kelly gets between her toes. Alicd follows suit, making sure Leslie's pinky toe is not left out of the fun.
"Please stop!"Leslie cries out with laughter.
"Okay, we yield" Kelly mutters. "We can't let you be the only one having fun."
112.title: Foot Massage

12.content:
Since Leslie has brought a tent with her (why does she bring that??), they can camp anywhere they want, they decide to go explore the island. When they were still in the sea, they already have a big idea about how the island like. It is all surrounded by the beach (absolutely, it is an island), and in the middle of the island, there is a huge forest. Beside the forest, there is jungle. On the other side of the island, there is a really high mountain. Beside the mountain, there is a valley. Then, Leslie and Kelly begins to talk about where to go, and Alice is pick up the dry clothes. Since those two girls are all barefoot (they have shoes in the bag, they are on the beach now) and their feet are always covered in boots or sneakers, an "evil" idea comes up to her mind. She decides to tickle the girls feet. Slowly sneaks to the girls, Alice is then ready to attack. Suddenly, she grabs Leslie's feet and begins to tickle her. "hahahaha..stop..hahahah, Alice, hahahaha...I know it's you..hahahahaha..stop..hahahaha." As Leslie is begging, Alice stops her tickling. "You know I am extremely ticklish, aren't you?" says Leslie with several drops of tear in her eyes, but only Alice sees that. "So..sorry, I don't know that." answers Alice, feeling guilty. "Well, put your feet on my lap, I will forgive you." says Leslie, with a evil smile in her face. "A..Ah? Ok." Alice doesn't realize that she is in Leslie's trap. She then put her feet on Leslie's trap. Quickly tug off the sneakers Alice put on just now, Leslie gives Alice some tickle on her soles. "hahahahahahaha...hahahahaha.." laughs Alice. "Well, now, we are balanced." says Leslie. "......." Alice is getting a little angry, but she also feels it so funny.
After the some tickle fight, the girls put on their socks and shoes.
Leslie is now wear a pair of high-top converse sneakers. (I am sorry to use the name from B2T, but I love B2T), with her ankle socks, jeans and t-shirt.
Alice is wearing her boots, ankle socks, shorts and her t-shirt.
Kelly is also wearing her boots, they are like winter boots, but thinner than winter boots. She likes ankle socks too, but she does have some pantyhose in her bag. But now, she has her bare feet in the boots. She is wearing skinny jeans and t-shirt.
Now, they decides to go separately, because they can ask others for help if one is in trouble. Although there is no signal on the island, their cellphones have super bluetooth. Therefore, they can communicate with each others easily. The battery for cellphone can be charged with solar energy, so they don't need to worry about the power.
Anyway, who are you going to be?
12.title: Plan on the beach

121.content:
Although there are 5 places to go, you can only go to three of them for now. Because 2 of them are on the other side of the island and you need to go through the forest the get there. Quickly check what you have with you, you are all set. Since you like your sneakers to be looser, the make retie the shoelaces so that you feel more comfortable. Now, you can even feel a little air get in and out of your sneakers. It feels so nice. But then, your mind comes back to where to go again.On your side, there are only the jungle, beach and the forest. You don't know what there are inside the forest, it can be nice or dangerous. It seems that the beach is safe enough, but the sea water is really weird. You don't know if there will be some weird creature in the sea or not. The jungle looks wet, and it is wet. There can also be something weird.
Where do you want to go?
121.title: Leslie

1211.content:
"Jungle sounds good." You think. Then, you head to the jungle. When you get to the jungle, you find you really beautiful. There are a lot of big trees, but not a lot of bugs. That's kind of nice. Then, you enters the jungle. After walking for a while, you find something weird. When you are walking, it gets harder and harder to move for another step. "oops." You think. Just as you think, you are sinking. Soon, your shoes and feet are inside the mud. It is not really mud, more like slime. Then, you feel that something is pulling you shoes. Since your shoes are really loose, the bottom of the shoes soon leave the soles of you feet. But luckily, right before the thing pull your shoes away completely from you, your toes clamp them. "Geez." You think. But then, something is now tickling your soles. "hahahahaha...hahahahaha..help!!..hahahha" you are laughing loudly, hoping someone can hear you. Although you have the cellphone, you totally forgot it. Suddenly, a vine wraps on your waist and pulls you up from the slime kind of mud. Your shoes are still stuck between your toes. When you are just trying to relax, another vine wraps you ankle together. "no!! hahahahah..hahahaha...hahaha..not..hahahaha..my..hahahahah...fee..hahaha...feet. ..hahaha.." you are tickled on your feet the next moment. Then, you think about you shoes."my shoes, if I put them on, my feet will be safe." you say to yourself. But unfortunately, your converse sneakers just fell on the ground and you are about a meter high in the air now. You cannot get it! You then feel hopeless. You don't want to be tickled forever on this island. But soon, an idea comes to your mind. Although the vines are still tickling your feet, you are focusing on your shoes so that it doesn't feel that ticklish then. You begins to swing and eventually, you get you shoes back on your hand. Quickly hit the vines with your hand to keep them away from your feet for a second, you put your shoes back on. Just as you expect, the vines cannot do anything to your feet when you have your shoes on. Finally, the vines give up. Then, you are free again!
What are you going to do next?
1211.title: Jungle

12111.content: You lost your way back, therefore, your only choice is to keep going. Not long after walking in the jungle, the humid air makes you sweaty, even though you rarely sweat when you are still in the city. Also, your converse begins to get a little muddy due to the mud on the ground. But there's nothing for you to complain about, because you know this is not bad yet. It would be truly tragic if some weird animals or bugs come out to get you. Fortunately, you do not see anything really harmful to you, or tickle you, coming out for quite some time. Although during this, the grass tries to untie you sneakers for a few times, but none succeeds. After some walking, you see something in front of you.

choices: a House full of tickle tools
A huge Picture of her being tickled on the wall
121112.content:
You look at the house looking really confused and giggled a little because of the Grass. Then she decided to check out whats happening in that house. So she walks towards the house checking out it's design. it looks more like a small cottage for summer time. she noticed a window and looked threw it while trying to fight of the ticklish Grass at her ankles. She notices that it's completely empty or from what she can get a view of but goes to the door to open it squeaked a little then she notices it's dark so she says " Anyone Home". You then find the switch and the light goes on only to see What " WHOA"
What is in that house

choices: See what is under the tarp.
Search the rest of the house.
1211121.content: When you enter the house it is covered in junk. There are feathers, feather screwdrivers, vibrators (of all types), along with hair brushes, machines with mechanical hands coming out of them, tables with restraining straps on them, and other strange junk. However, out of all the junk only one thing catches your eye. A something large with an old dusty tarp over top of it. Out of everything in the house it is the only thing covered in dust, everything else looks as if it was just cleaned. This seems very strange to you and you wan't to see why it's covered up, unlike anything else.
1211121.title: House Of Tickle Tools.

12111211.content: Out of curiosity you lift the tarp off of the object. Underneath there is a very strange looking chair, that looks like it leans back into a recliner. The chair is metal with padding, it seems harmless enough so you decide to take a seat. Once you sit down a quiet beep is heard and the chair starts to shake. Metal cuffs come out of the arms and legs, latching you in the chair. You fight and struggle for a while without any luck. Then the chair leans back, to the point where it is almost completely flat, and then leans back even further. So that your now in an arched position, your belly is now uncovered, from the stretching. As you start to struggle again you find that its almost impossible, the chair has you perfectly trapped.
12111211.title: Under The Tarp.

choices: Bug, vines, animals, and tall and long grass
121112112.content: Like 100 machanical hands come out. They takes off Leslie's shoes and socks. They grab some tickle tools and starts to tickle Leslie. She is now in a tickle trap. Just the she sees something. What is it?
121112112.title: Feet.

choices: Meet the monster, face to face.
1211122.content:
The house is completely empty but looks much larger on the inside than form outside. There is a large, long hallway that looks as if it has no end. As you stare down the hall and take a few more steps into the room, you notice a large painting on the wall. To your surprise the painting is of you, being tickled by hundreds of hands, with sharp claws. This worries you a lot. Them you hear the door slam shut behind you, immediately you turn around. A faint voice is heard coming from the direction of the painting, "Leslie........ Leslie.... Leslie!".
You turn back around very quickly, only to notice that the painting is now different. Now it depicts you, standing in the room looking at the painting with a black, shadowy figure standing behind you. Terrified, you turn around as fast as possible. Nothing is there, but you hear the voice again, "Leslie...... Leslie.... Leslie!".
Afraid of what you might see if you turn around again, you start walking towards the door. However when you reach the door, it has been locked and there isn't a key in sight. Then something starts warping around your legs "Ahhhh, what is that!!!", you scream. Before you can even react, the black, shadowy black tentacles pull you to the ground. Then they start dragging you towards the painting, which the tentacles are coming out of. Once close enough to the wall the tentacles lift you up and begin pulling you into the painting. Half way in you grab the frame of the painting, to stop the tentacles. But, then you feel your shoes fall off, and what feels like a feather teasing your soles. "Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha ahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahahaha!!!", you laugh as your fingers give out, and your pulled completely into the painting.
1211122.title: The Painting.

12111221.content:
You meet the shadowy black figure face to face. The figure never stops changing, its shape is always shifting as if to hide its true self. Now inside the painting the figure releases you from its grip, leaving you time to get a good look at your captor. "What do you want with me!?!", you yell.
The figure doesn't say anything, it just stands still staring at you. You start to get a little angry with the figure for ignoring you, "What gives, you drag me into this painting and now what, huh? What are you going to do with me!?!". It then lunges after you and almost engolfs you in shadow. After a minute your completely restrained, you can't move at all, every sensitive spot is in perfect reach and your terrified. "What are you?", asking in a scared tone.
For a while there is no response, and then there is only the word "DEMON" that leaves the figure. Your fear has never been greater than it is now. After answering your question the demon then starts it merciless torture upon your exposed body.
12111221.title: TICKLE DEMON

12112.title: Uh oh

choices: Leave them as is and risk it.
Something happens before she can decide.
1212.content:
Entering into the forest, Leslie looks around. Seeing the shade of the forest cools her off, and she walks along a trail, the grass growing on both sides.

As she walks, the trail narrows, until there is nothing but woods surrounding her. Vines wrap themselves around the trees as the grass grows denser underneath her feet.

Moving forward, Leslie feels her converse slipping loosely on her feet. Having loosened the laces earlier, she doesn't seem to worry, taking in her surroundings. It's not until her heel pops completely out of her shoe that she looks down. Both shoes have come untied, and are almost a third of the way unlaced. Leslie ponders this for a moment, before continuing to walk, liking the danger of potentially losing her shoes.

As her heels pop further and further out of her converse, a blade of grass brushes her foot, tickling her quite a bit. Looking over her shoes again, they're only half laced at this point, and she is starting to have difficulties keeping them on. She ponders if she should tie them again to stop the tickling, or whether the danger and thrill it gives her is worth the risk.

What should she do?
1212.title: Forest

choices: fully untie the converse and leave that lace there
12121.content:
After previous experience, Leslie decides that retie her converse would be a better idea than losing them, although she loves the feeling of having them hanging loosely on her feet. She sets one knee on the grass, and tries to retie her left sneaker. While doing that, her right heel pop out of the sneaker since her sneakers were so loose, and a blade of grass brushes on her right sole. Leslie giggles, continuing tying her left sneaker. This is really not something that would take long but for Leslie, this process takes forever, only because her feet are so ticklish and the grass keeps tickling her when she is tying her shoelace. Finally, a few minutes later, Leslie finishes the lace of her left sneaker. But at this point of time, she hears something. *sha*sha*pluhhh*sha*. It sounds like something stepping on fallen leaves, but the *pluhhh* sounds like a bird flips its wings. But anyhow, this is not a good time for Leslie to stay there and try to figure out what this sound is. She decides to hide in the tree, so that the creature cannot find her. She slowly, and quietly goes towards a bunch of trees, but on her way there, she finds the lace of her right converse is tangled on a big stick. It is so tangled that if she wants to untie it, she would have to spend another two minutes, which she does not have.
What can she do?
12121.title: Relace and tie her converse.

choices: The bird is attracted by the shoelace
121212.content: Thinking of the grass, you figure that it is a better choice to keep your sneaker on, even though it will become extremely loose. Without hesitation, you unlace that shoe completely and walk slowly into the bushes, crouching to avoid being seen by the creature. *sha*sha*sha*, the creature is getting closer and closer, to where your shoelace is left. It is a big bird, with huge wings, on which the feather look so soft and smooth. Due to you interest in animals, you are stunned by how this bird looks. It's got a long beak and big black eyes, granting them the ability to see things well in almost any situation. After being fascinated for a second, you realize you are on a special island. A bad feeling comes to you.
121212.title: Lovely bird, but not on this island

1212122.content: As you think, the bird walks closer and closer to you shoelace, staring at it, probably also wondering what it is, if it can think. You do not want the bird to find you, not after experiencing so many "funny" things on this island, otherwise you may want to get closer and feel the bird. You are still crouching, but it is getting tougher for you, for the grass has sought your foot in which the converse is totally unlaced. You begin to sweat a little, as you are getting nervous and anxious. But the bird seems to be really patient. It just stays where it is, wanders a little while waiting, as if it knows you are there. A blade of grass brushes on you right sole as you right heel pops out the shoe when you crouched. You resist the laughter, and push your foot back in your converse. It is quite some work for you to keep your right foot in the converse sneaker because the shoe is too loose. Therefore, it cannot last forever. You get to make a choice, go out, or leave with you super loose shoe.
1212122.title: The bird is attracted by the shoelace

choices: Cut her remaining lace and lace both.
Leave her shoe as is, and keep going.
12121221.content:
Not wanting to see what the bird does, Leslie decides to leave her lace behind and further explore the forest.

After a couple of steps, Leslie realizes the hope of keeping her unlaced converse on is dismal at best, as she is having to clench her toes with each step to just barely keep the shoe on. With each step, half her foot comes out of the shoe, and the grass tickles her sole. Resisting the urge to laugh as well as she can, Leslie makes her way deeper in.

More vines creep down from the trees onto the forest ground, lying across Leslie's path. Missing a step, she trips on one of these vines, her extremely loose shoe falling off, the grass tickling her foot. Unable to contain her laughter, Leslie sits down on the ground, slowly putting her footwear back on. If she cut her remaining lace in half, she could have more security on her unlaced shoe, but her tied shoe would be a lot easier to remove.

What should Leslie do?
12121221.title: Sneak away

choices: It flies away and leave you alone
12121222.content: Being a girl with a boy-like personality, you make a quite boy-like choice. You decide to come out, and you are actually curious what can the bird do to you. You stand up, walking out from the bushes. And surely, the bird stops wandering and quickly turn its head to you. It is so agile, totally not affected by its big body size. Right after that, it turns its head up and makes a really high and loud piping sound. You put your hand on your ears and try to prevent the noise from getting into you ear, but it doesn't work well as expected. You feel so weak, and you sight begins to blur. You cannot control your body, even though the sound is over. You sit down on the grassy forest floor, and stretch out you legs, gasping. Of course, while you are doing that, the bird is walking towards you. And apparently, you do not realize that. The high sound is quite harmful to human, and your brain is not working properly right now. It probably won't take you long to recover from that, but clearly the last thing you have is time. A few second later, the bird is standing right before you. It bend down its neck, and aiming its pointy beak at you. Its beak reach down to your tummy and scratching lightly on your belly. Again!? Tickling!? You get awake from the faint. Same time, you burst into laughter. But that's not the worst part. It seems the bird is not satisfied with your laughter, it decides to "wing you". It bites on you t-shirt, and rips it apart, leaving only underwear on your upper body. You scream:" No!!! That's my only shirt!!!". But the bird does not care about you protest. It reaches down its wings and brushes it on you tummy. The only two thing you can do now is laugh and shift backwards on the grass. But neither way helps you. This tickling lasts for a little while. But fortunately for you, the bird only focuses on you upper body, not you lower body, otherwise you would have lost consciousness from laughing too hard. Now, the bird seems want to do something.
12121222.title: Be brave and get out

choices: You kick them with you right foot

You are tired.
1212122221.title: You laugh

12121222211.content:
You force yourself to be awake, for you do not want to be poked on your soles anymore, it tickles, a lot. And, you don't know if one day they may figure out a way to untie you the other converse and get you in real trouble. Being tickled on both feet is not the same story of being tickled on one foot. Also, a little hole has showed on you left sock at where the bird pokes. You have to escape. In order not to make any sound, you have your mouth tightly shut and rolls on the feather-covered nest. The feathers tickle you tummy while you are rolling on them. "hehe-hehehe" you try to resist the laughter, but it doesn't work effectively enough, so you still make a little laughing sounds. Fortunately enough for you, it is not loud enough to wake up the birds. After a while of torture, you finally get to the edge of the nest. You quickly stand on your left foot and swing you right leg over on the other side, touching the grassy floor. The grassy floor tickles you bare left foot a little, but it is still bearable. A second later, you get completely out of the nest. Now, you are standing in the middle of nowhere. You, being a huge fan of the Hunger Games, have learned something about how to live outdoors. You decide to find a tree first, but since there are trees all around you, you can skip that step. Slowly climbing on the tree, trying not to hurt your bare foot is a little harder than you think it is. With a huge effort, you successfully get on the tree. And now, there is one thing that you really need to use, a rope. Actually, you have the rope, and you are using it right now. "Shoelace, this thing is quite necessary for camping outside, ironically." you whisper to yourself, and slowly unlace you right converse one-third of its way down. Now, you tie your shoelace, together with your both legs, on the branch you are sitting on. "There, I can sleep now" With this in your mind, you fall asleep.
In the morning......
12121222211.title: Night on a big mountain...

121212222111.content: You slowly open you eyes, letting the light getting into your eyes gradually. But different as you expected, the sky is still dark. It is not the same as the darkness at night, it is a, quirky, strange dark, like something has covered the sky. You quickly untie yourself and retie your converse, then look carefully at the sky. It is cloud. "Cloud!?" You are shocked by what you own answer. "Oh no, this cloud should indicate---volcano. You quickly pick up your phone and get Kelly and Alice into a group call. "Run! The mountain is a volcano, run as far as you can!" You yell at your two friends the moment they get into the call. "Where are you, why don't I see any thing indicate volcano eruption?" Asks Alice. "I AM ON THE MOUNTAIN!!" you scream at Alice, try to get her going. "BOOM", right after you finish you sentence, you hear you explosion-like sound. Strangely, no lava has come out, but some black gel. You can also see, on top of the mountain, a tremendous amount of black gel pushes down, crushing everything in its way. A big bird, actually, the big bird that tickled you before, tries to fly over the gel and a huge black hand forms from the gel, grabs the bird and pulls it into the gel. The bird doesn't even have a chance to make a sound. "Gosh" You whispers to yourself, then you realize that you are still on the phone. "Alice, Kelly, are you still there?" "I saw it, I have to come." the two girls say the exact same thing at exactly the same time. Then, they hang up the phone. "Hey..." You want to say something, but no one can hear you. Several drops of tears slides down from you eyes. This is dangerous, but they are still coming for you. You cannot say a thing, not even to yourself, because you are afraid that you will cry if you open your mouth. But on this other side, the gel is not moved by your friendship. It is still coming down. You have to make a quick decision, go up to the top of the tree, or get down and run.
121212222111.title: The black gel

choices: Kick it with you left feet (your converse covered foot)
Jump into the gel to see what it does
1212122221111.content:
You hesitate, because you don't know which way may be better. But time makes a choice for you. The gel is now not far from you thanks to your over-and-over-again thinking. Without having a choice, you climb up to the top of the tree. The tree is not as tall as you think it is, although it looks really tall when you are at its root. You also realize one thing, that is, the gel may be able to get you, since you are not far enough away from it even when you are at the top of the tree. But it is already to late to make a change. You will have to face whatever is coming at you. As you predict, it is only three inches away from you feet when it flow over where you were three minutes ago. But it is not time to relax, because running over things is not the only thing the gel does. The gel "has hands". As you are trying to move even a little farther away from the flowing gel, a black gooey hand shows from the gel below you. The hand cannot be called a big hand, for it is about as big as your own hand, which, can be called somewhat small. But the hand does look disgusting as little drops of goo falls from it. Clearly, the hand is going for you right bare foot. On the tree, you don't even have a chance to avoid the attack. The goo is squirming on your sole, little by little. With a grunt, you try to slam your foot through the bottom of the gel, then back through the top of it again. It seems to be working, the hard gel splitting and cracking around your foot. As soon as the gel is safely away from your tree, you lower yourself onto a 'V'-shaped spot where two branches grow, seating yourself comfortably in the base of the 'V'.

The gel managed to melt a hole through the rubber around the ball of your foot, framing the ball of your pinkish, hypersensitive foot through the rubber. The rest of the sole of your shoe is smooth, and feels rather thin. It's obviously much weaker than it was before.

At least your shoelace is still intact. You let your feet dangle, the slight breeze from their movement tickling the toes and ball of your left foot, and caressing your right foot. You grin, as you think back to the thrill you had felt yesterday, letting your shoes flop around on this ticklish island, risking their loss. Well, you've managed to lose both your socks, and one sneaker, and almost get the other one destroyed. You smile at that. Getting back to your bag on the beach will be fun, to say the least!

You look down at the gel again, remembering suddenly that Kelly and Alice were supposed to be coming for you. Worry courses through you, and you text them both, getting no response. Part of you yearns to try to find them now, while another part of you says it would be wiser to wait until the gel has hardened...

12122.content:
The thrill of possibly losing her shoes to the ticklish forest quickly outweighs the idea of stuffing her feet up by retying them properly. Besides, its not like the grass has managed to tickle her for more than a brief second before her foot returns to her shoe.

Smiling, Leslie continues on her way, slight giggles escaping her lips with every step, as grass brushes against her sock-clad soles. Her toes scrunch slightly inside her converse, just barely enough to keep her feet within her shoes as she walks. What Leslie doesn't notice is that, as she walks, the friction of her heels dragging against the inside of her converse is beginning to slide her ankle socks down her heels, little by little. Her toes scrunch harder and harder with each step, struggling to keep her shoes on her feet.

Leslie keeps going until she realizes her path ahead is blocked by a large tree that has fallen. It's nearly waist-high, and she won't be able to just step over it. Looking to the sides, all she can see is vine-covered tree trunks, and brush too thick to just walk through.

As she steps up to the log, Leslie is surprised to feel some grass tickling the bare arch and heel of her foot! She squeals in surprise, half-shuffling her foot forward to get away from it, nearly losing it in the process! She looks down at her feet, and realizes her converses are almost completely unlaced at this point, the laces trailing behind her feet. She then carefully lifts her right heel out of it's shoe, and spots her sock balled around the arch of her foot. How had she not noticed that?

Leslie looks back to the log in front of her. Keeping her shoes on has gotten quite hard, and her bare heels and arches are being exposed with every step. She's not certain she can keep them on as she crosses the log.

On the other hand, she's made it this far with them coming unlaced. Maybe she can make it a little further...?

Leslie looked at her bag in dismay. It was hanging open, and a few articles of clothing were scattered around it. She ran over to it, and quickly inventoried what was left.

She quickly found that any top with sleeves and all of her jeans were missing, along with her other pair of Converses and her boots. She'd been left with a few tank tops and crop tops for her upper half, and some short-shorts and miniskirts for her lower half. Her binini was still there, but all of her socks were missing.

The only shoes she had left in her bag were a pair of flip-flops, a pair of strappy flat tie-on sandals, and a pair of slightly-loose lowcut ballet flats. Leslie swore softly. This island was fast becoming a ticklish nightmare for her.

She stuffed the scattered clothing back into her bag, the sat down next to it, pulling her left shoe and sock off. She wanted to change out of her sweaty jeans and t-shirt, but they were the only things she had left that covered her waist, armpits, and knees.

121221222122.content:
As much as she wanted out of her sweaty clothes, she knew she'd want the protection they provided from the ticklish island. With a groan, she turned to look at her meager footwear options.

The flip-flops were the least secure item she had, easily lost or stolen, and leaving her feet almost entirely exposed.

The flat sandals were the most secure shoes, yet they still exposed most of her feet. The trio of ultra-thin straps over the balls of her feet and the pair of equally-thin straps to tie around her ankles still left her toes, arches and heels quite exposed, but at least her soles would be reasonably covered.

The flats provided a middle-ground. They were old, and wear and tear made them a bit loose, enough that her heels might pop out. Their low-cut nature meant the tops of her arches peeked over the sides, and the leather at the front didn't fully cover her toes.

Her exhaustion forgotten for the moment, Leslie began following the prints up the beach. Leslie slid to a halt next to her shoes, lying a few feet apart in the sand. Looking down, she could see they were her favorite pair of old low-top Converses, the ones she'd had for years. She gave another slight squeal of excitement at seeing them, happy that they hadn't been lost.

She sat in the sand next to them, quickly stripping off her remaining shoe and sock, then brushing the sand from her bare soles. As she pulled them onto her bare feet, her excitement waned a bit. As attached to these shoes as she was, they were old, and her friends often asked her why she kept such a ratty pair of shoes, when she had newer ones.

The shoes showed every bit of wear and tear she'd put them through. They'd been worn everywhere from beaches to hikes in the mountains to shopping trips in the city, and they'd been beaten and battered as a result. Both shoes were riddled with holes and tears, and their soles were completely worn out.

Leslie looked at the shoes as she loosely tied their laces. They were too small for her, and the only reasons she could still wear them were the splits on either side of her toes. and her love for wearing her Converses loosely enough she could slide her feet out at will. On the inside, the splits were nearly three inches long, running from the backs of the rubber toecaps nearly halfway down her arches. The outer splits were two-and-a-half inches long, running from the toecaps back behind the balls of her feet, her little toes completely exposed through the splits. Even loosely tied, the splits stretched upwards, clearly showing the pink skin of her feet through them, the remaining stitching straining to contain her feet. Two smaller splits showed at the backs of her heels, giving faint glimpses of the pink skin behind them as she walked.

She'd worn through the soles at the balls of her feet long ago, and a pair of half-dollar sized holes clearly showed the balls of her feet on the inner portion of the sole, as well as the space beneath her big toes. Two large cracks ran completely across the balls of her feet, the only thing keeping the part beneath her toes attached to the shoes were the rubber strips that ran around the soles. The remainder of the soles were paper-thin, worn completely smooth by time and near-continuous wear.

Though she knew these shoes were on their last legs, she still kept them, and wore them. Despite the numerous splits and holes, they were still the most comfortable shoes she owned, and she'd sworn she'd wear them until they fell off her feet. Even on this ticklish island, where those splits and holes made her vulnerable to tickling, they still brought her comfort, and lifted her spirits some.

Shaking herself from her brief reverie, Leslie stood, leaving her other Converse and sock lying on the sand, and traced the trail with her eyes into the...

She looked down at her beloved, battered Converses one more time, wiggled her toes, then set off across the sand towards where the trail met the edge of the jungle. It took all of a few steps for her previous sense of excitement to wane a bit, as she felt grainy flooding into her shoes through the holes in their soles and the splits in their sides. Comfortable and familiar as they were, they definitely weren't going to keep her completely safe from whatever ticklish traps lurked in the jungle.

As she walked into the shade at the edge of the jungle, she sighed slightly, both at the temporary coolness, and as she felt the gritty sand giving way to damp dirt that stuck to the exposed portions of the balls of her soles. It wasn't something that she had really paid attention to before. In fact, she had quietly enjoyed being able to feel those slight changes in the ground underfoot, despite wearing shoes. Now, though, she felt...conflicted.

On one hand, she knew it would be easier to tickle her feet than it had been before. On the other hand, it felt a lot like one-upping her earlier risk-taking, and another slight thrill of excitement wriggled its' way through her, somewhat offsetting her trepidation. If she had made it as far as she had, first with her shoes coming unlaced, then with one bare foot, why couldn't she make it just as far with these shoes, holes and all?

Grinning slightly at that thought, she pressed deeper into the jungle, feeling, and resisting, the faint tickles on the balls of her feet, as the air and ground around her grew steadily wetter, carefully tracing the footprints in the soft earth. The jungle pressed in closer to her, vines beginning to snake up massive trees, and the undergrowth growing much thicker, as she continued on. As sweat began to trickle across her brow again, she came to a rather muddy patch. She lost the trail there for a moment, then spotted it again on the far side, though she couldn't figure out where the footprints had gone.

She took a quick look around, and decided there was one of two things her quarry had done. It had either swung from some low-hanging vines above the mud, or it had cut off through the brush, where the ground was firmer, though she couldn't see any trace of its' trail in the brush from here.

All of the options posed their own problems, especially as some of the vines around her seemed to be writhing a bit. She knew the ground itself, and the plants as well, were likely to tickle her, and that made simply going through the mud seem the best bet. However, knowing what she did, she also couldn't rule out the mud itself being some kind of trap, and that thought disturbed her.

Faced with what seemed to be a lose-lose-lose set of choices, she chooses to...
1212212221311.title: Jungle

choices: She manages to make it across the mud with her shoes intact
She manages to make it across the mud with her shoes on her feet...
She ends up trapped in the ticklish mud!
12122122213111.content:
Knowing the brush would definitely take it upon itself to tickle her, if not outright strip her of her shoes again, and not trusting the vines to merely tickle her, she chose to simply go through the muddy patch. At all of ten meters across, it wouldn't take her more than a few steps to be clear of it again, and she'd continue pursuing her erstwhile thief from there.

She stepped into the mud with her left foot, gasping slightly in surprise as some of it oozed through the holes in her shoe. It was much cooler, and thicker, than she had expected. That thought was replaced a moment later with a spontaneous giggle, as its' cool caress turned to a much more ticklish sensation, as it oozed down her sole, and started squeezing between her toes.

She stood there for a moment, her foot sinking a bit deeper, before she realized she needed to move quickly, and try to keep as much of the mud as she could out of her shoes. Alternately giggling and swearing, she put her right foot into the gooey, ticklish mud, then wrestled her left shoe free of the mud with a slurping sound. She set off as fast as she could through the mud, feeling it pulling at her shoes with every step, hoping they would stay both intact and on her feet...
12122122213111.title: Go straight through the mud

121221222131112.content:
She kept moving as quickly as she dared, feeling the mud completely flooding her shoes, her giggles turning into outright laughter, as it caressed her toes, soles, and arches, seeming to ooze around her feet of its' own accord as she kept walking. She could feel the laces on her shoes loosening a little, every time she pulled them free of the mud, that ominous slurping sound accompanying every step forward, as her heels popped free with every step. What she didn't realize, though, was what that slurping sound had covered, the faint sounds of her already-weakened shoes slowly pulling her shoes apart.

Luckily for Leslie, she was out of the mud fairly quickly, thought it wasn't as fast as she had originally thought. Strangely, as she set foot on more solid ground, she could feel the mud ooze back out of the gaps in her shoes, back into the patch of mud behind her. As thankful as she was for that, she couldn't ignore how the ticklish sensations hadn't left the toes of her left foot at all. As the rest of her foot, and all but the ball of her right foot, had been relieved of the ticklish sensations, she was luckily able to suppress her laughter to giddy little giggles every time the toes of her left foot hit the damp dirt underfoot. Finding a log that at least had a little space between it and the brush and vines, she plopped her butt down on it, and took a quick look at her shoes.

Her left shoe was worse off than her right, probably because she'd stood on it for that extra moment, letting it sink into the mud. The sole of her shoe had been torn free of her shoe at the front, leaving her foot exposed from toes to ball, and about an inch of it behind the ball of her foot hung limply, pulled free of the rubber edging. The splits along the sides of the upper had spread, too, coming within an inch and a half of merging with the also much-expanded heel split, which now encompassed almost her entire heel. Her entire left arch was now exposed, along with almost all of her out-step. Her right shoe had fared better, the sole still being there, though definitely looser where the split crossed it. The splits had grown too, though not as drastically as on her left shoe. Both of them had come untied, and partially unlaced. She noticed in passing, though, that the mud had left her skin clean, and the dirt didn't seem to be sticking like it had before.

She tied her shoes again, as tightly as she dared this time. The splits in her left shoe gaped obscenely, allowing her to tie it a bit tighter than the right one, though she was quite ginger with how she pulled the laces. She resolved, as she tied her shoes, to avoid any other muddy patches she encounters, as she seriously doubted her shoes would survive another encounter like that. She needed to find the thief, and fast, before the jungle managed to leave her barefoot in its' ticklish embrace.

As she stood, she felt a sensation behind her, and spun around to find a mass of vines had crept up behind her while she was assessing her shoes! With a half-squeal, half-giggle, she took a half-step back as the vines reached towards her...

Does she escape?
121221222131112.title: She manages to make it across the mud with her ...

choices: Back to the beach for new shoes
121221231.content:
As Leslie's left foot comes off the ground, she can feel her shoe slipping from her foot! She tries to scrunch her toes, but it's too late, and her shoe falls off her foot. Her right shoe suffers a similar fate, as her toe slips inside her shoe, the converse limply dropping to the ground below.

Leslie looks back over her shoulder, and watches as the grass pulls her shoes away, out of sight. She pouts a bit at the loss of her favorite shoes, but realizes there's nothing she can do about it. The rough bark beneath her soles reminds her that she only has a pair of half-fallen socks to protect her size 4 feet, and she takes a moment to pull them both up. Leslie shuffles her feet for a moment, feeling the bark snagging at her socks. They won't last long on any kind of rough terrain, and they provide nearly no protection to her feet. She debates whether to go back to her bag for new shoes, or to keep going.
121221231.title: Both shoes

choices: follow the monkeys and get the shoe back
go on with one shoe and her ankle socks
the monkeys come back without the shoe
1212212311.content: Leslie decided to keep going even though she lost both of her shoes. Every step she takes tickles her feet and she can't stand it anymore, when she suddenly saw a pai of black high top vans, so she decides to wear them, very loose of course. She slipped out of them with every step because they are one size bigger than the shoes she normally wears. She goes on when suddenly two monkeys come by. One monkey wrestles her to the ground while the other one is starting to take off one shoe and starts tickling her socked feet. The monkey wanted the other shoe too but Leslie manages to keep her left Vans shoe on and the Monkeys run away with the other vans shoe. Leslie decides to tie her left shoe so they can't come of that easy.
1212212311.title: Keep going, into...

choices: She loses her shoes and socks
She fails to scale the log
1212213.content: What happens? Lost shoes and socks? Misses the jump? Other options?
1212213.title: Failure!  She loses her footwear, fails to make...

choices: Hits someone below with the coconut
Succeeds in knocking more coconuts down
1213.content:
Walking along through some dense scrub brush just off of the beach, Leslie wanders into a lovely area of tall palm trees with coconuts high up in their branches. Looking around on the ground, she spots nothing that might be useful for throwing at the coconuts, but decides it's worth the risk to try to climb up the slender trees and knock afew to the ground to bring back to her friends Leslie and Kelly.

"Good thing I have my jeans on", she thinks as she begins the slow shimmy upwards towards the coconut prizes high overhead. "If I was in shorts, the prickly palm tree would be scratching my thighs."

After longer than she'd anticipated, Leslie is now high above the beach, just below the strong branches of the palm, where the huge coconuts are. Grasping tightly, she attempts to kick one off - and succeeds! Then, she tries another and -
1213.title: Beach

choices: She wakes up back on the beach with her friends
12132.content: "bang" the coconut hits the sand. Slowly, Leslie slides down the tree. "There, we have two coconuts now." While saying that, she tries to pick up one of the coconuts. "Man, this thing is heavy. I don't know if I can handle it." Thinking about this, Leslie decides to go with one coconut at a time. She picks up one, and shift her steps to move back to the tent, for it is too hard for her to both carry such a heavy coconut and walk properly. Not long after her picking up the coconut, she can see her tent. But something wrong occurs. Leslie begins to sink into the sand with her coconut. "Darn, quicksand. He---lp!!!" screams Leslie. Of course, her screaming doesn't help her to get out, and unfortunately, both of the other two girls are gone for their own adventure. Slowly, Leslie sinks into the sand and loses her consciousness.
12132.title: when heavy coconuts meet quick sand

122.content:
Wandering from the sunny beach into the dense jungle, Alice thinks, "I'm glad I have my boots on. These are some weird-looking plants for sure!". The hot humid air causes her shorts and tee shirt to stick to her, and she is quickly damp with perspiration. Minutes later, Alice finds a small path of sorts through the huge jungle fronds. "Hmm, I wonder if this is only an animal path, or if there are other people living on this tropical island?", thinks the pretty blond.

As she ventures still further, Alice texts to her friends, 'Nothing yet', and proceeds down the slightly sloping path into still denser foliage, where she discovers -
122.title: Alice

1222.content: “HEEELLLOOOOO-O-O-o.” Alice screamed into the cave. She waited a moment to hear if anyone or anything was in it. There was no answer, so she yelled again. “HEEELLLOOOOO-O-O-o.” The echo was the only response she received. She looked around the area, to see if any of her friends were nearby. Nowhere in sight. Alice now had a choice, should she enter the cave or avoid it.
1222.title: A cave entrance

123.content: "Whew! It is too hot for these jeans and boots", whispers Kelly as she pushes through the leafy green fronds into the shady, sticky jungle interior. Just as she's thinking, "I wish we were all exploring this place together", Kelly gets a text from Leslie that says:
123.title: Kelly

choices: She hears someone laughing really hard
1231.content:
"Kelly, I am lost in the jungle. Do you have any clue about how to get out of this thing? I don't I can stay long in here whatsoever. Everything tickles! Please come! SOS" ---Leslie.
"My goodness, I get to help her." Thinking Kelly. Being a really smart girl, she mark on the grassy floor to give her a clue how to get out, then, she walks deeper into the jungle. But clearly, Kelly does not know, right after she leaves, the mark on the grassy floor gets covered by some other grass.
When Kelly walks deeper into the jungle, the environment gets more humid. The air feels wet. Drops of water forms on the trees and vines. "Dang, my boots are getting a little wet, that makes my feet feeling weird." That's the only thing that Kelly can complain so far. She has such good luck that nothing's coming to tickle her yet. But also, she haven't found Leslie either.
She keeps texting Leslie while walking, but this is no reply. She knows that she needs to go faster, for both her own good and Leslie. Because she has a feeling that something is approaching.
1231.title: I'm lost

choices: A phone being held by vine!!?
12312.content: "hahaha, he--hahahaha--lp!!!!" You hear a girl voice, screaming. You decides to check it out. Working as fast as you can, you find a path to where the voice coming from. "hahahaha, som--hahaha,someone, hahahah---help--haha" The voice keeps coming out. As it is getting louder and louder, you know you are going the right direction. Just after a few more steps, you see a huge jungle tree with many vines dangling on it. "OMG..." you mutter to yourself. From the tree-direction, you can hear the laughing voice. Right at the root of the tree, you see a pair of black converse hi-tops, just like Leslies. They are loose, with the shoelace untied. "Leslie!! Where are you!?" shout you. But there is no reply, but laughing. You cannot tell where the laughing is from. But when you look up, you see something.
12312.title: She hears someone laughing really hard

123122.content: Looking up, Kelly sees a phone held by a vine, playing the laughing sound over and over again. "Darn, it is a trap." thinking about this, you grabs the pair of converse and prepare to run. But at this moment, the vine drops the phone, rockets toward you and wrap you on you waist. The vine lifts you up in the air, about 4 feet off the ground. Right in front of you, from the bushes, gracefully walks out a girl with pointy ears. On her back a quiver is held, and in her hand is a bow. She has some clothing on, but they are made of leaves. On her feet is a pair of sandals, and it seems like the sandals are from a human society. It's an elf. "Elf!? Do elves really exist?" Although you were scared by the vines at the beginning, this emotion is now replaced by stun. "Yes, I am an elf and I am the lord of this portion of forest, where is bushes circles around." The elf has quite some pride. As Kelly has heard something about elves. Some elves have the ability to communicate tree, and some can communicate with water, or something else. Apparently, this one can communicate with plants. "What have you done to Leslie!!?" After the stun, Kelly's mind is now filled with anger. She wants to save her friend. "Oh, that ticklish girl with those odd footwear in you hands, she is over there. She deserves this, how dare she try to steal things from my land. And you, you'd better worry about yourselves." After saying this, the elf keeps her mouth shut. Kelly looks the way she points at, seeing Leslie lying on a wooden bed, tied by vines. Her shirt is sitting on the ground, and her socks are missing. Leslie's eyes are shut tightly. Kelly angrily turns her head back and look at the elf's eyes, trying to see through her. At this moment, the elf speaks again, "Don't waste you power, save some for laughing. And by the way, I suddenly feel like that I need to have some new clothes, and yours look good. I guess, you should take them off for me, or I can do it for you."
123122.title: A phone being held by vine!!?

1231222.content:
"Don't even think about it, bitch." Kelly screams at the elf. "Oh, really, I think then I will need to teach you something. Enjoy" after saying that, the elf shows a smile, then she put one step back and begin to watch the "show".
The vine around Kelly's waist now wraps even tighter, then it runs into Kelly's shirt and try to take it off. Same time, another two vines wrap around each of Kelly's legs, leaving her very little space to move. "You stupid elf, I dare you have a fight with me!" Shouts Kelly. "I will, but you will regret then." says the elf, calmly. Following her voice, the forth vine come out from the tree and takes off Kelly's shirt. "Stop it! No, hahaha--haha,no--haha" protests Kelly, but it doesn't work. But the worst thing is, after her shirt is off, the vine on her waist begins to tickle her belly button and the other vine begins to tickle her armpits. "Haha, stop--hahaha, you--hahaha--bi--haha--bitch--hahaha" Kelly cannot resist the tickling, she is too ticklish to handle it. While she is laughing hard, the elf walk towards her, then stops right before her. The elf put one hand on her right boot, moves along her leg, up and down, and finally stops at the ankle. "You know, if I have these, I will be able to conquer more land. Thank you for bringing these to me." While saying that, she hold the boot tightly and pull it downwards. The boot slides along Kelly's leg, tickles her a little. Finally, her boot gets taken off her foot completely, revealing a tiny size 5 foot. The elf strokes her right foot, making Kelly laugh even louder. Kelly tries to kick her with that foot, but the elf catches it. "Bad, bad girl. How come you are not wearing those thing stuff you are friend is wearing. And, how dare you try to kick me. You will be punished for this." says the elf, and quickly, she pulls the other boot off Kelly's feet. Same time, the two vines that wraps around Kelly's legs now are coming for her feet. The end of the vines strokes lightly on her feet at the beginning. "Hahaha--no--my--haha-my--haha--boots--haha." Kelly's laughter shows her fear. She tries to kick away the vines, but she fails. One vine now ties tightly on her left big toe and the other one tickles between her toes of her left foot. "Nooo-haha-hahahaha." By now, Kelly cannot even finish a whole word. The elf taps on her right sole a few times then says, "Thank you for your stuff, you and your friend will be released in a few hours. Bye"
Then, the elf turns around and start to walk away.
1231222.title: Tragedy? For whom?

12312221.content:
"Sto--hahaha--op!" shouts Kelly. "What now?" says the elf, near the bushes. She turns her head, but same time, Kelly lift up her left arm and throw the converse shoes in her hand at the elf. "Pa!" A shoe hit the elf right in her face, the elf steps backward a few times and got tripped by the bushes, then falls into the bushes. A few seconds after that, a laughing sounds comes out from the bushes. "Nooo-hahahahaha, no--hahaha, hahaha." It is so beautiful to Kelly. Because during the talking, she figures that the elf can only control the plants in the area they are in, and the bushes are not part of those plants she can control. Of course, then the bushes will tickle her it she falls into those. Since the elf is tickled so hard that the only thing she knows is laughing, the vines release Kelly and Leslie. Kelly retrieves Leslie's converse and put them on her feet, but only temporarily, because she needs to get her stuff back. She pull on the shoes and walks towards the elf. The elf is actually in a terrible situation, for her. The grass sneaks under her soles in the sandals and brushes her feet. Her leaves-made shirt is totally ripped by the bushes. Her smooth bare legs are covered dirt that vibrates which tickles her a lot. In the elf's hand are Kelly's boots and Leslie's socks. Kelly grabs her boots and Leslie's socks, decide to leave. But just that second, a new idea comes out of her mind. She looses the straps of the elf's sandals. "hahaha--haha--pleasss--hahaha, don't--hahaha!" the elf begs while laughing. As the straps are loosen, the sandals are getting taken away from the elf's feet. Within a second, the sandals are half off her feet and her heels are exposed to the grass. "hahaha--hahaha--haha!" The elf's voice has become a little raucous because of laughing too hard. She kicks her legs crazily and her left sandal flies off her foot and hit Leslie.
"Uhh, what, just happened? haha--hahaha." Leslie sits up and accidentally sets her feet on the grassy floor. The grass tickles her feet, makes her laugh.
When Leslie sits up, the elf kicks off the other sandal off her foot, and it lands right into Leslie's hands.
"What's this..." wonders Leslie.
"I will tell you on our way back." answers Kelly.
"haha-hahaha--please--don't--hahaha-leave--hahahah--me--hahaha--me-- hahaha, alone--hahaha" begs the elf.
"It would be great if we get a slave to do something for us." Thinking about that, Kelly break a vine, ties it on the elf's hands and pulls her out. "Thank you...." says the elf, then she faints.
12312221.title: You are mine now

choices: Kelly and Leslie found all their clothes gone, as well as the elf
They cannot find the elf's sandals.
123122211.content:
The elf opens her eyes, finding herself by a fire. The night has fallen. Almost everything is sleeping right now. She feels warmth coming to her from the fire, making her head more clear. But she cannot really remember how she gets here. She turns around and sees two human. Right, they are Leslie and Kelly. The two girls just had a little tickle fight, of course, a friendly one. Now, they are laying on the grass, expose their bare feet to the warmth of the fire, gazing at the elf and waiting for her to say something. As expected, they elf opens her mouth, "Puny human, untie me." The elf says that in an angry and superior tone, making the two girls fairly uncomfortable. "Huh, someone is quite rude. Rudeness is not a good quality for a SLAVVVVE." Saying that, Kelly gives a contemptuous smile. Then, she walks to the elf's bare feet. "Wh--at, what are you doing...hahaha--haha--stop--hahaha." The elf was scared by Kelly's move, then laughter fills her mouth spontaneously. Kelly's fingers stroke the elf's bare feet, scratch on them occasionally. "Pleeeeee---se--hahaha...noo-hahaha.." The elf's feet are so ticklish that she cannot help laughing even though Kelly wasn't trying to tickle her hard. "I wonder how you keep your feet like this in the jungle." Kelly sighs, but still stoking the elf's feet. After a few minutes, Kelly stops. The elf gasps on the ground. "Okay...Okay..I surrender. But please...Don't do it again."
"Good, I just happen to need a guide. I grant you the honor to be our guide. But to assure you won't trick us, I need something pledge, for instance, your clothes." says Kelly.
"That's too much! Don't even think about it." Complains the elf.
"Oh? Is it?" questions Kelly, wiggling her fingers.
"......Fine.." The elf is frightened. After having her hands unbound, She takes off her leaf-made clothes, leaving only her leaf-made bra and a leaf skirt on, and hands it over to Kelly.
Kelly feels the leaf shirt on her hand. She is surprised as she notice the shirt is quite delicate.
"Ok, you can rest now, we will keep on tomorrow." Kelly rebounds the elf's hands, then walk back to Leslie. Leslie whisper to Kelly, pretending to be mad, "You know what, you were really cool just now. I bet you enjoyed the tickling just now, didn't you. How dare you not give me a chance to tickle those gorgeous feet. You are in trouble tonight..."

Late in the night, even in her dream, the elf can still hear some delightful laughter.

In the morning, what happens?
123122211.title: They wakes up the elf

choices: Try to find the elf's sandals
1231222112.content:
The elf's eyes open to see the same two girls from yesterday standing around the coals of a fire. "Look who decided to wake up." Kelly said. "Leslie was going to tickle you and see if that would wake you up, but now she doesn't need to." The elf stretched, ignoring the two humans, then asked," So where do you want to go?" "Dunno." Kelly responded. "Maybe back to the beach that we crashed at?" The elf glared at her, then decided not to risk it. She wouldn't admit this, but her feet were just as ticklish as the girls thought they were. "Fine, follow me." The elf muttered. She knew a path going right through the jungle that would take them there. She began to walk, the two girls trailing behind her...

As soon as the elf's feet touched the dirt of the path, she felt a tingling sensationon her soles. The two girls watched in confusion as the elf began to giggle. "Hahaha---forgot that everything---hahaha---tickles you---hahaha.." They grabbed her bare shoulders and pulled her back, still giggling from the tickling. After the elf had caught her breath, she told the girls sheepishly," As you can see, I'm a little ticklish." "A little?" Kelly injected. The elf ignored her and continued," Do you have any spare shoes?" "Ummm, didn't you have sandals?" Leslie asked. "I did, but a certain person took them off." The elf responded, glaring pointedly at Kelly. "Anyways, unless you have something to cover my feet, I can't guide you." "Great." Thought Kelly. "Alright, I can either make her shoes, or try to find her original ones."
1231222112.title: Don't lose your shoes on the Island of Tickling

12312221122.content:
Back at the camp, the two girls decided to try to find the elf's shoes. Leslie had volunteered to stay behind and watch the elf, so Kelly ended up with the task of finding the sandals. Two minutes later, she was in the gloom of the forest, looking for the place that she first met the elf. Little did she know, the island was planning something too...

Leslie sat next to the ashes of their fire. She thought about her family back home. She missed them, but she couldn't do anything about it until she got off the island. She stared at the gray ashes of the fire, then at the elf. She was taking a nap, she had said something about humans boring her. Leslie had to admit, if her ears hadn't been pointed, she would have been very pretty. Looking at her sand covered feet, she suddenly got an idea.

Kelly wandered around the forest, looking for the patch of vines where the elf had kicked off her shoes. "Why does she have to be so ticklish?" She thought aloud. Then, she saw it, the vines that had tickled her, except now they were perfectly still. She looked to the left of them and saw two leaf sandals. "Yes!" She cheered as she picked them up. "Now I just have to get out of here and---Hey!" The vines that she had thought were still had grabbed her and were pulling her toward them, two of them prying off her shoes. "My phone." She thought. Kelly quickly pulled it out, trying to text with one hand. She hit four letters H-E-L-P then send. Then, she got pulled to the vines, one of them knocking the phone out of her hands. "Hahahahahaha---stop that---hahahahahaha---noooo---haha.." She laughed as the vines tickled her feet. Some of them tortured her soles, while others tickled her heels lightly and yet more still tickled her toes. "Hahahahaha---stopitstopitstopit---hahaha.." The vines began tickling between her toes, and some creeped up to tickle her thighs. "Hahaha---not there---haha!" Then, the vines switched tactics, tickling her belly, sides and underarms all at the same time. Kelly's feet were sensitive, but her underarms were her true weak spot. Of course, it also didn't help that her belly and sides were ticklish too. She laughed and howled, trying to twist out of the tickling vines that held her spread eagle, but it was no use. The vines were simply too tight. "Come on, Leslie." She thought.
12312221122.title: Try to find the elf's sandals

123122211221.content: Back at camp, Leslie had bound the elf's hands and feet. She had tied her hands to a tree branch, so her arms hung up, and she had sat her on a log. The elf's big toes had been tied together. Leslie waited for the elf to wake up, and when she did she said," Sleep well?" The elf looked around, then at the vines that held her immobile. "You promised you wouldn't tickle me again!" The elf protested. "No, Kelly promised, not me." The elf twisted in her bonds, then gave up. "Just get it over with." Leslie smiled, then pulled out two feathers. She ran them down the elf's soles. "Hahahaha!" The elf's feet were sensitive to the slightest touch. "Kelly was right, how do you keep your feet like this?" Leslie asked, continuing to tickle the elf's soles. The elf didn't respond, she was too busy laughing. Leslie dropped the feathers, instead scratching the elf's arches. "Hahahaha---stop it human---hahahaha!" Leslie didn't listen, of course, to the elf's pleads. Instead she continued stroking the elf's soles for five more minutes, then stopped abruptly. The elf hung there, panting. Then, she watched as Leslie walked to her torso. She gently squeezed the elf's sides. She yelped, then began laughing again as Leslie began tickling her ribcage, poking her fingers between her ribs. "Hahahahaha---not there---hahaha!" Leslie continued this for five minutes before suddenly tickling her underarms, vulnerable because her arms were hanging up. The elf hated being tickled in the armpits, it was her second most ticklish spot. "Hahahaha---please stop---hahaha!" Leslie spider tickled the elf's underarms for what seemed like an eternity, but it was just for five minutes. Then, still wiggling her fingers in one underarm, she untied the elf's arms. The moment she did that, the elf clamped her arms down, then glared angrily at Leslie. She didn't seem to notice, instead walking back to her soles. She lightly tickled them while she untied her, just so she could hear the elf laugh. Then, her phone rang...
123122211221.title: Leslie gets her text

info.brief_description: A plane crashed over the Pacific ocean. Some of the survivor got on an island.
info.description:
A plane crashed in the Pacific 0cean and some of the survivors successfully get onto an island. All the survivor are girls. On the island, all the things are going to tickle them. There can be different things. For example, planys, mushrooms, trees, animals, whatever there can be in the wild.
Rule:
No killing
No sex
Tickle girls only
No short chapter
No nudity
Have fun!
info.pretty_title: escape from the island of tickling
